menu_channel.title: Menu
menu_channel.desc: Here you can create your own product or view existing ones.

open.title: Hello,
open.desc: Please select an action. Your balance -

labels: Enter a unique name for your product

created.title: Good job!
created.desc: Your product has been created. You can watch it or sell it by clicking on the 'Show my products' button.

show.text: There are no products on your account.

labels: Enter the price of your product

price.title: Success!
price.desc: The product is for sale in the forum 'catalog'. As soon as the user buys this product, you will make a profit. If you have placed an item by mistake, then you can return it.

buy.title: The product was successfully purchased.
buy.text: You don't have enough money to buy the product.

take_off.text: You don't own the item to return it.

error1.text: Please enter the price as a number.
